name: glass fibre reinforced plastic production, polyamide, injection moulded | glass fibre reinforced plastic, polyamide, injection moulded | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5683/documentation

Based on assumptions for material uses. Data for processing and infrastructure are assumed with generic inventory.;The glass-fibre content is assumed to be 30%.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Gate to gate inventory for the injection moulding of glass fibre with polyamide resin including material inputs, process and infrastructure.
category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: To European average. Background data for polyamide resin were not available. Its use has been approximated with melamine formaldehyde resin.
